name: officedev-microsoft-teams-samples-msgext-search-auth-config-csharp
title: Search Auth Config In Messaging Extension
shortDescription: This sample demonstrates how to implement authentication in a C# Messaging Extension for Microsoft Teams, enabling secure access and user-specific interactions.
longDescription: This C# sample illustrates how to create a search-based Messaging Extension in Microsoft Teams that incorporates authentication via Azure Active Directory. It features a configuration page for the bot and demonstrates how to securely sign in and access user-specific data using the Microsoft Graph API.
